item.title: T-shirts from Real Genius
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: After a recent viewing of Real Genius I was compelled to own an “I Love Toxic Waste" t-shirt. However, my search for the perfect shirt was extremely frustrating. Unable to find a decent replica of the shirt, I decided to make my own. (Link courtesy of BoingBoing)
